## kl auth

login | logout to kloudlite

### Synopsis

```
login/logout to kloudlite.

  Examples:
  # login to kloudlite
  kl auth login

  # logout to kloudlite
  kl auth logout
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for auth
```
